Html:
Excel allows you to add notes to cells, much like the alt tag in html. I have not found any indication whether phpexcel supports this. Can someone clarify this for me?

Many thanks

Hello,

PHPExcel supports it but it does not seem to work with Excel5 Writer : (I started a discussion about this problem : http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=76409 )

to add a note :

 

$workbook->getActiveSheet()->getComment('B2')->setAuthor('me');
$workbook->getActiveSheet()->getComment('B2')->setVisible('true');
$workbook->getActiveSheet()->getComment('B2')->getText()->createTextRun('TEST COMMENT');
